org.zamia.fsm

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zamia.fsm.State

  • public class State
extends java.lang.Object
    A state in our state machine model. Basically has an identifier, outputs and conditial transitions to other states
    Author:
    Guenter Bartsch
